name: raycast-extension-chatgpt
description: An extension that can talk with the ChatGPT
author: ryonakae

preferences.name: model
preferences.description: ID of the model to use.
preferences.title: Model

preferences.name: temperature
preferences.description: What sampling temperature to use, between 0 and 2. Higher values like 0.8 will make the output more random, while lower values like 0.2 will make it more focused and deterministic. We generally recommend altering this or top_p but not both.
preferences.title: Temperature

preferences.name: maxTokens
preferences.description: The maximum number of tokens to generate in the chat completion. The total length of input tokens and generated tokens is limited by the model's context length.
preferences.title: Maximum length

preferences.name: stop
preferences.description: Up to 4 sequences where the API will stop generating further tokens.
preferences.title: Stop sequences

preferences.name: topP
preferences.description: An alternative to sampling with temperature, called nucleus sampling, where the model considers the results of the tokens with top_p probability mass. So 0.1 means only the tokens comprising the top 10% probability mass are considered. We generally recommend altering this or temperature but not both.
preferences.title: Top P

preferences.name: frequencyPenalty
preferences.description: Number between -2.0 and 2.0. Positive values penalize new tokens based on their existing frequency in the text so far, decreasing the model's likelihood to repeat the same line verbatim.
preferences.title: Frequency penalty

preferences.name: presencePenalty
preferences.description: Number between -2.0 and 2.0. Positive values penalize new tokens based on whether they appear in the text so far, increasing the model's likelihood to talk about new topics.
preferences.title: Presence penalty

preferences.name: saveMessages
preferences.description: When enabled, the conversation will not be deleted even if the extension is closed.
preferences.title: Save messages
preferences.label: Save the conversation

preferences.name: imeFix
preferences.description: Fixes problems during IME conversion in Japanese, Chinese, Korean, etc. Empty list items are displayed at the top of the list. To submit the prompt, press the bottom of the keyboard once and then press Enter.
preferences.title: IME Fix
preferences.label: Fixes problems during IME conversion

title: Raycast GPT
